card.name: Niyare Get, Zero Trick
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all colorless cards from among them into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Jojojo Jokers
card.text: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a Jokers creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Bainaradoor
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

card.name: Yattareman
card.text: ■ Your Jokers cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Pali Nights
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Tutankhanen
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw a card.

card.name: Ura NICE
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Draw a card. ■ Icon

card.name: Hakushon Mask
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the lowest power in the battle zone and destroys it.

card.name: Arizona Headshot
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

card.name: Gunbutler Great Seven
card.text: ■ If you have 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone, this creature costs 5 less to summon. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets +7000 power until the End Step ■ Your Jokers can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Gunba Great/Gagun Gun Gagun
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ========================= ■ Put a Jokers card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Shadan Q
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Whenever you are attacked by a creature, you may tap this creature to stop the attack.

card.name: Jobato De Runo
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and tap it. Then, choose a creature and untap it.
